elements.description:
`arc-request-workspace`

A request workspace component for Advanced REST Client that creates a
list of requests.

The element does not contain any logic responsible for storing and restoring
data. To use this component handle `workspace-state-store` and `workspace-state-read`
custom events. See source for implementation detaild.

## Styling

`<arc-request-workspace>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--arc-request-workspace` | Mixin applied to this elment | `{}`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-backgroud-color` | | `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-border-color` | | `#e5e5e5`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-color` | | `rgba(0,0,0,0.87)`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-selected-background-color` | | `#fff`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-close-color` | Color of tab close button | `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.78)`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-close-color-hover` | Color of tab close button when hovered | `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.54)`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-close-background-color-hover` | Background color of tab close button when hovered | `#FF8A65`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-add-color` | Color of the add tab button | `#616161`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-add-background-color` | Background color of the add tab button | ``
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-add-color-hover` | Color of the add tab button when hovered | `#616161`
`--arc-request-workspace-tabs-add-background-color-hover` | Background color of the add tab button when hovered | ``
`--arc-request-workspace-tab-dragging-background-color` | Background color of a tab when dragged | `#fff !important`
`--context-menu-item-color` | Color of the context menu item | ``
`--context-menu-item-background-color` | Background color of the context menu item | ``
`--context-menu-item-color-hover` | Color of the context menu item when hovered | ``
`--context-menu-item-background-color-hover` | Background color of the context menu item when hovered | ``
`--bottom-sheet-width` | Bottom sheet width | `100%`
`--bottom-sheet-max-width` | Bottom sheet max width | `700px`

properties.name: draggableEnabled
properties.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

properties.name: redirectUri
properties.description: The OAuth2 redirect URI to pass to the authorization panel.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Index of selected request panel

properties.name: activeRequests
properties.description: List of currently loaded requests

properties.name: environment
properties.description:
Currently selected workspace.
When this value change it triggers workspace state change.

properties.name: variables
properties.description:
Workspace variables.
It is added to each request sent from this worksapce so the request logic
can apply additional variables.

properties.name: requestTimeout
properties.description: Each request sent from this workspace timeout.

properties.name: validateCertificates
properties.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library to validate SSL certificates.

properties.name: followRedirects
properties.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library how to manage redirects.

properties.name: sentMessageLimit
properties.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library to limit the size of the source message
sent to the server returned by the library. It is used to limit
memory use when reading the response.

properties.name: workspaceReadOnly
properties.description: When set writing to the workspace state file is disabled.

properties.name: restoring
properties.description: If set then workspace restoration process is in progress.

properties.name: noAutoRestore
properties.description:
The component automatically ask to restore workspace when connected
to the DOM. This ensures to prohibit auto restore request.

properties.name: editorOpened
properties.description: When set the request meta data editor is opened.

properties.name: detailsOpened
properties.description: When set the request meta data viewer is opened.

properties.name: snippetsOpened
properties.description: When set the code snippets element is opened.

properties.name: snippetRequest
properties.description: A request object to be passed to the code snippets element.

properties.name: initialized
properties.description: Set when workspace state has been read.

properties.name: noAutoProjects
properties.description:
When set the elements that require project data won't automatically
ask for project data.

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: If set it renders the view in the narrow layout.

properties.name: oauth2RedirectUri
properties.description:
Redirect URL for the OAuth2 authorization.
If can be also set by dispatching `oauth2-redirect-url-changed`
with `value` property on the `detail` object.

methods.name: __setPanelRequestProperties
methods.description:
Sets initial properties to the request panel.
Note, this operation may be very resource consuming since (depending on the request)
there may be a lot of computations happening in the request editor.

methods.name: __setPanelConfiguration
methods.description: Passes configuration like `narrow` and `oauth2RedirectUri` to the panel

methods.name: __addPanelListeners
methods.description: Adds event listeners to the panel

methods.name: __removePanelListeners
methods.description: Removes previously attached listeners from the panel

methods.name: __getPanelById
methods.description: Finds and returns panel by id in shadow DOM.

return.desc: Request panel or undefined if not found

methods.name: __addPanel
methods.description:
Adds new panel to the shadow DOM based on passed request.
The request object must contain its `_id` property when performing this
action even when the request is not saved to the store.

methods.name: __removePanel
methods.description: Removes panel from the shadow DOM.

methods.name: __editorRequestHandler
methods.description:
Handler for the `editor-request-changed` from the `request-panel`.
Notifies application about the state.
This works as a bridge between Polymer's binding system and the app
as the request panel is inserted into the DOM manually.

methods.name: __editorMetaHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `editor-state-changed`, `response-meta-changed`,
`response-changed`, `response-error-changed`, and `is-error-response-changed`
events to update workspace state when any of the meta data to store
in workspace file changes.

methods.name: __deselectPanels
methods.description: Hiddes all visible panels in the view by adding "hidden" attribute.

methods.name: __selectPanel
methods.description: Shows a panel in the view by removing "hidden" attribute.

methods.name: __updatePanelRequest
methods.description:
Updates request object on existing panel.
The request object may have different id to replace the request at a position.
If the ID is different new ID from the request object is used.

methods.name: __removeAllPanels
methods.description: Removes all panels from the workspace.

methods.name: __updatePanelsProperty
methods.description: Updates a property on all panels

methods.name: _dragStart
methods.description:
Handler for the `dragstart` event added to the list item when `draggableEnabled`
is set to true.
This function sets request data on the `dataTransfer` object with `arc/request-object`
mime type. The request data is a serialized JSON with request model.

methods.name: _removeTabSelectionColor
methods.description: Memorizes and removes tabs selection colors. It can be restored by calling `_resetReorderStyles()`.

methods.name: _startReorderDrag
methods.description: Starts tabs reordering action.

methods.name: _dragEnd
methods.description:
Handler for the dragend event. It only performs an action when reordering
is active.

methods.name: _finishReorder
methods.description: Reorders tabs and resets workspace state.

methods.name: _removeRipples
methods.description: Removes ripple effect from paper-tab element

methods.name: _rearrangeReorder
methods.description: Moves a tab to corresponding position when drag finishes.

return.desc: Position where the request has been moved to.

methods.name: _resetReorderStyles
methods.description: Resets tabs selection styles and drag target visibility when reorder finishes.

methods.name: _resetReorderChildren
methods.description: Resets styles of paper-tabs that has been moved during reorder action.

methods.name: _computeDraggableValue
methods.description:
Computes value for the `draggable` property of the list item.
When `draggableEnabled` is set it returns true which is one of the
conditions to enable drag and drop on an element.

return.desc: `true` or `false` (as string) depending on the argument.

methods.name: _resetReorderState
methods.description: Resets state of the reorder info object.

methods.name: _dragoverHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `dragover` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it renders drop message.

methods.name: _reorderDragover
methods.description:
Handles `dragover` event when in reoedering model.
It updates tabs position and sets variables later used to compute position.

methods.name: _getReorderDdx
methods.description: Computes the delat from previous move.

return.desc: When negative it is moving left and moving right othewise.

methods.name: _updateReorderMoves
methods.description:
Adds (x,y) coordinates of the current move. It is later use to compute
the delta.

methods.name: _updateChildrenReorder
methods.description:
Updates position of the children in `paper-tab` container while tracking
an item.

params.name: draggedIndex
params.description: Index of the tab being dragged.

params.name: overIndex
params.description: Index of the tab being under the pointer.

methods.name: _dragleaveHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `dragleave` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it hides drop message.

methods.name: _dropHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `drag` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it adds request to saved requests.

methods.name: _dropRequest
methods.description:
Adds a request to the workspace.
It reads request data from the event and depending on keys configuration
either add request to the workspace or repace existing requests.

methods.name: _dropProject
methods.description:
Adds project to the dowspace.
It reads project data from the event and depending on keys configuration
either add requests to the workspace or repace existing requests.

methods.name: _computeDropOrder
methods.description: Computes index of the drop.

return.desc: Index where to drop the object.

methods.name: _blockEditors
methods.description: Sets `readonly` state on all editors

methods.name: _unblockEditors
methods.description: Removes `readonly` state from all editors

methods.name: _getReorderedItem
methods.description:
Gets the top level item from the DOM repeater that has been marked as a
draggable item.
The event can originate from child elements which shouldn't be dragged.

return.desc:
An element that is container for draggable items. Undefined if couldn't
find.

methods.name: _updateTabPosition
methods.description: Scrolls tabs right or left depending on dragged element position.

methods.name: _newTabDragover
methods.description: Action to handle dragover event when not in reorder mode.

methods.name: _removeDropPointer
methods.description: Removes drop pointer from shadow root.

methods.name: _createDropPointer
methods.description: Removes drop pointer to shadow root.

params.name: ref
params.description: A list item to be used as a reference point.

methods.name: _dispatchWorkspaceState
methods.description: Dispatches `workspace-state-read` event and returns it.

methods.name: restoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Restores workspace state.
It dispatches `workspace-state-read` custom event to query for workspace data
and restores requests if they were previously stored.

methods.name: _restoreModelError
methods.description: Called when no-model error occurred during workspace restoration.

methods.name: _restore
methods.description: Restores workspace state from previously stored data.

methods.name: _restoreRequests
methods.description: Restores requests from the state object.

params.name: requests
params.description:
List of requests to restore. When not set
then it adds empty request.

methods.name: _restoreSelected
methods.description:
Restores selection from the state file.
Note, at the point of state restoriation selection won't be handled properly.
It has to be re-selected after state restoration is complete.

params.name: selected
params.description:
Selected tab. When not set it selects last available
tab

methods.name: _restoreEnvironment
methods.description: Restores selected environment from the state file.

params.name: environment
params.description: Environment to restore. Nothing happens if not set.

methods.name: _restoreVariables
methods.description:
Restores workspace variables.
Each item must contain the following properties:
- variable {String} - variable name
- value {String} - variable value, can contain nested variables
- enabled {Boolean} - By default it is true, set false to disable the variable

methods.name: _restoreConfiguration
methods.description: Restores workspace variables.

methods.name: _afterRestore
methods.description:
Forces current selection and resets restoration flags after next
render.

methods.name: serializeWorkspace
methods.description: Serializes workspace state to a JavaScript object.

methods.name: serializeConfig
methods.description: Serializes workspace configuration.

methods.name: _notifyStoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Runs debouncer and after timeoout it calls `__dispatchStoreWorkspace()`
to dispatch store event.
If timer is running it's going to be cancelled and new timer set.

methods.name: _clearStoreTimeout
methods.description: Clears previously set storing timer.

methods.name: __dispatchStoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Dispatches `workspace-state-store` custom event to store workspace data.
The type of the request is `workspace-state`.

If there's an error it is not reported back to the user.

methods.name: _workspaceConfigChanged
methods.description:
A handler for any of the workspace configuration options changed.
It notifies change to the listeners.

methods.name: _workspaceReadOnlyChanged
methods.description:
Called when workspaceReadOnly property change. Always calls
`_workspaceReadOnlyChanged()`.

methods.name: _dispatch
methods.description:
Dispatches bubbling and composed custom event.
By default the event is cancelable until `cancelable` property is set to false.

params.name: cancelable
params.description: When false the event is not cancelable.

methods.name: _getEmptyPosition
methods.description: Finds first position where the request is empty.

methods.name: _computeTabName
methods.description: Computes name for a tab.

return.desc: Tab name which is (in order) name, url, or "New request".

methods.name: appendRequest
methods.description:
Appends request to the list of `activeRequests` and selects it.

Note, the request data are passed after rext render frame so returned
index referes to empty object at the time when it's returned.

params.name: opts
params.description:
Add request options:
- skipPositionCheck {Boolean} - Won't check for empty panel before
appending it to the list
- noAutoSelect {Boolean} - Won't attempt to select added request

methods.name: appendRequestAt
methods.description:
Adds a request at specific position moving the request at the position to the right.
If the position is out of `activeRequests` bounds

params.name: index
params.description: The position of the tab where to put the request

params.name: opts
params.description:
Add request options:
- noAutoSelect {Boolean} - Won't attempt to select added request

methods.name: addEmptyRequest
methods.description: Adds an empty request to the workspace.

methods.name: updateRequestObject
methods.description: Updates request on a specific position.

methods.name: _closeRequest
methods.description: Handler for click event on the request close button.

methods.name: removeRequest
methods.description: Removes request for given index

params.name: removeOnly
params.description:
When true it only removes the panel but
will not check for the selection state and if empty panel is needed

methods.name: refreshTabs
methods.description: Update tabs selection.

methods.name: _selectedChanged
methods.description: Notifies workspace state change when selected request changes.

methods.name: _requestsListChanged
methods.description: Notifies workspace state change when request data changes.

methods.name: _envChangedHandler
methods.description: Updates environment value in the state file when it's value change.

methods.name: _variablesChanged
methods.description:
Observer for workspace variable change.
Notifies workspace state change when needed.

methods.name: findRequestIndex
methods.description: Finds requests index in the list of active requests.

params.name: tmpId
params.description:
An ID created by this component to identify
not saved request.

return.desc: Request index or -1 if not found.

methods.name: _getMenuRequest
methods.description:
Finds a request associated with the menu item which is the target of the
event. The menu item has to have `data-id` property set to request ID.

return.desc: Request object or undefined if not found.

methods.name: _requestStoreHandler
methods.description: Opens save editor

methods.name: _renderRequestDetail
methods.description: Opens the request details view

methods.name: _renderCodeSnippets
methods.description:
Dispatches `request-code-snippets` event with `request` object on the
detail.

methods.name: _requestStoreFileHandler
methods.description: Handler for the store to file request menu item.

methods.name: _requestStoreDriveHandler
methods.description: Handler for the store to Drive request menu item.

methods.name: _exportRequest
methods.description: Runs export flow.

params.name: destination
params.description: Destination supported by the export component.

methods.name: _dispatchExportData
methods.description: Dispatches `export-data` event and returns it.

params.name: destination
params.description: A place where export the data (file, drive)

methods.name: _requestChangeHandler
methods.description:
Handler for non cancelable `request-object-changed` custom event.
Updates request object if it's one of currently opened objects.

methods.name: _requestDeleteHandler
methods.description:
A handler for `request-object-deleted` custom event.
Checks if deleted request is one of curerently rendered. If found it
removes information related to "saved" request.

methods.name: addRequestById
methods.description: Adds request(s) by id.

params.name: id
params.description: Request id or list of ids

methods.name: replaceByRequestId
methods.description: Replaces current workspace with a request(s) passed in the argument.

params.name: id
params.description: Request id or list of ids

methods.name: clearWorkspace
methods.description: Clears the workspace. Adds new empty request when ready.

params.name: ignoreAdd
params.description: If set it won't add empty panel.

methods.name: appendByProject
methods.description: Adds requests by a project.

params.name: index
params.description: Position where to start adding requests from the project.

methods.name: replaceByProject
methods.description: Replace current workspace data by a project.

methods.name: _openProjectHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `workspace-open-project-requests` dispatched by projects
menu.

params.name: e
params.description:
Detail object contains `project` which can be
string as project ID or project object and `replace` which determines
if the workspace state should be replaced.

methods.name: replaceByRequestsData
methods.description: Replaces current workspace with the request data passed as an argument.

params.name: requests
params.description: List of ArcRequest objects to use.

methods.name: saveOpened
methods.description: Informs components to store request data.

params.name: opts
params.description:
Optional. If `source` property is set it
dispatches `save-request` custom event immidietly. Otherwise dialog
is shown.

methods.name: _resizeSheetContent
methods.description: Called to request resize on opened `bottom-sheet` element.

methods.name: _openSaveDialog
methods.description: Render saved dialog (bottom-sheet)

params.name: request
params.description: Request to set on the editor

methods.name: _cancelRequestEdit
methods.description: Cancels request edit dialog and closes the dialog.

methods.name: _saveRequestEdit
methods.description: Closes request edit dialog when save event is dispatched.

methods.name: _deleteRequestDetails
methods.description: Handler for the delete action from the details popup.

methods.name: getActivePanel
methods.description: Returns a reference to currently selected panel.

methods.name: sendCurrent
methods.description: Runs cureently active tab.

methods.name: abortCurrent
methods.description: Aborts currenlt selected panel

methods.name: clearCurrent
methods.description: Aborts currenlt selected panel

methods.name: abortAll
methods.description: Aborts all running requests

methods.name: appendImportRequests
methods.description: Appends Project/Saved/History export data directly to workspace.

params.name: detail
params.description: Arc import object with normalized import structure.

methods.name: _appendRequestHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `request-workspace-append` custom event. Appends request
to the worspace.

params.name: e
params.description: A `request` property on detail object is expected.

methods.name: _sendRequestHandler
methods.description:
Adds workspace configuration to the request object.
This overrides application configuration.
The function won't set configuration property when it is already set on the request.

methods.name: duplicateTab
methods.description: Duplicates tab values at a position

methods.name: _clearRequestMeta
methods.description: Removes all stored properties in a request object to prepare ArcRequest object.

methods.name: closeActiveTab
methods.description: Closes currently selected tab.

elements.name: UiElements.ArcRequestWorkspace

attributes.name: draggable-enabled
attributes.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

attributes.name: redirect-uri
attributes.description: The OAuth2 redirect URI to pass to the authorization panel.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Index of selected request panel

attributes.name: active-requests
attributes.description: List of currently loaded requests

attributes.name: environment
attributes.description:
Currently selected workspace.
When this value change it triggers workspace state change.

attributes.name: variables
attributes.description:
Workspace variables.
It is added to each request sent from this worksapce so the request logic
can apply additional variables.

attributes.name: request-timeout
attributes.description: Each request sent from this workspace timeout.

attributes.name: validate-certificates
attributes.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library to validate SSL certificates.

attributes.name: follow-redirects
attributes.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library how to manage redirects.

attributes.name: sent-message-limit
attributes.description:
Added to all requests sent from this workspace.
Instructs the transport library to limit the size of the source message
sent to the server returned by the library. It is used to limit
memory use when reading the response.

attributes.name: workspace-read-only
attributes.description: When set writing to the workspace state file is disabled.

attributes.name: restoring
attributes.description: If set then workspace restoration process is in progress.

attributes.name: no-auto-restore
attributes.description:
The component automatically ask to restore workspace when connected
to the DOM. This ensures to prohibit auto restore request.

attributes.name: editor-opened
attributes.description: When set the request meta data editor is opened.

attributes.name: details-opened
attributes.description: When set the request meta data viewer is opened.

attributes.name: snippets-opened
attributes.description: When set the code snippets element is opened.

attributes.name: snippet-request
attributes.description: A request object to be passed to the code snippets element.

attributes.name: initialized
attributes.description: Set when workspace state has been read.

attributes.name: no-auto-projects
attributes.description:
When set the elements that require project data won't automatically
ask for project data.

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: If set it renders the view in the narrow layout.

attributes.name: oauth2-redirect-uri
attributes.description:
Redirect URL for the OAuth2 authorization.
If can be also set by dispatching `oauth2-redirect-url-changed`
with `value` property on the `detail` object.

mixins.description:
This mixin is mostly created to reduce amount of code in
`arc-request-workspace` element.

The mixin specializes in placing `request-panel`s in the shadow DOM
wiyhout using Polymer's repeater.

Problem with repeater is that when re-arranging items or closing an
item in the workspace it updates every instance of the request panel
to the right of the changed element and this costs a lot giving that each
panel has to perform a lot of computation to render the view.

This element uses repeater to rendert he tabs, however it handles the content
by it's own. This mixin contains implementation for DOM manipulation for
request panels.

methods.name: __setPanelRequestProperties
methods.description:
Sets initial properties to the request panel.
Note, this operation may be very resource consuming since (depending on the request)
there may be a lot of computations happening in the request editor.

methods.name: __setPanelConfiguration
methods.description: Passes configuration like `narrow` and `oauth2RedirectUri` to the panel

methods.name: __addPanelListeners
methods.description: Adds event listeners to the panel

methods.name: __removePanelListeners
methods.description: Removes previously attached listeners from the panel

methods.name: __getPanelById
methods.description: Finds and returns panel by id in shadow DOM.

return.desc: Request panel or undefined if not found

methods.name: __addPanel
methods.description:
Adds new panel to the shadow DOM based on passed request.
The request object must contain its `_id` property when performing this
action even when the request is not saved to the store.

methods.name: __removePanel
methods.description: Removes panel from the shadow DOM.

methods.name: __editorRequestHandler
methods.description:
Handler for the `editor-request-changed` from the `request-panel`.
Notifies application about the state.
This works as a bridge between Polymer's binding system and the app
as the request panel is inserted into the DOM manually.

methods.name: __editorMetaHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `editor-state-changed`, `response-meta-changed`,
`response-changed`, `response-error-changed`, and `is-error-response-changed`
events to update workspace state when any of the meta data to store
in workspace file changes.

methods.name: __deselectPanels
methods.description: Hiddes all visible panels in the view by adding "hidden" attribute.

methods.name: __selectPanel
methods.description: Shows a panel in the view by removing "hidden" attribute.

methods.name: __updatePanelRequest
methods.description:
Updates request object on existing panel.
The request object may have different id to replace the request at a position.
If the ID is different new ID from the request object is used.

methods.name: __removeAllPanels
methods.description: Removes all panels from the workspace.

methods.name: __updatePanelsProperty
methods.description: Updates a property on all panels

mixins.name: ArcWorkspaceRequestsMixin

mixins.description:
This mixin is to reduce amount of code in `arc-request-workspace` element
and to separate drag and drop for tabs logic.

properties.name: draggableEnabled
properties.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

methods.name: _dragStart
methods.description:
Handler for the `dragstart` event added to the list item when `draggableEnabled`
is set to true.
This function sets request data on the `dataTransfer` object with `arc/request-object`
mime type. The request data is a serialized JSON with request model.

methods.name: _removeTabSelectionColor
methods.description: Memorizes and removes tabs selection colors. It can be restored by calling `_resetReorderStyles()`.

methods.name: _startReorderDrag
methods.description: Starts tabs reordering action.

methods.name: _dragEnd
methods.description:
Handler for the dragend event. It only performs an action when reordering
is active.

methods.name: _finishReorder
methods.description: Reorders tabs and resets workspace state.

methods.name: _removeRipples
methods.description: Removes ripple effect from paper-tab element

methods.name: _rearrangeReorder
methods.description: Moves a tab to corresponding position when drag finishes.

return.desc: Position where the request has been moved to.

methods.name: _resetReorderStyles
methods.description: Resets tabs selection styles and drag target visibility when reorder finishes.

methods.name: _resetReorderChildren
methods.description: Resets styles of paper-tabs that has been moved during reorder action.

methods.name: _computeDraggableValue
methods.description:
Computes value for the `draggable` property of the list item.
When `draggableEnabled` is set it returns true which is one of the
conditions to enable drag and drop on an element.

return.desc: `true` or `false` (as string) depending on the argument.

methods.name: _resetReorderState
methods.description: Resets state of the reorder info object.

methods.name: _dragoverHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `dragover` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it renders drop message.

methods.name: _reorderDragover
methods.description:
Handles `dragover` event when in reoedering model.
It updates tabs position and sets variables later used to compute position.

methods.name: _getReorderDdx
methods.description: Computes the delat from previous move.

return.desc: When negative it is moving left and moving right othewise.

methods.name: _updateReorderMoves
methods.description:
Adds (x,y) coordinates of the current move. It is later use to compute
the delta.

methods.name: _updateChildrenReorder
methods.description:
Updates position of the children in `paper-tab` container while tracking
an item.

params.name: draggedIndex
params.description: Index of the tab being dragged.

params.name: overIndex
params.description: Index of the tab being under the pointer.

methods.name: _dragleaveHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `dragleave` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it hides drop message.

methods.name: _dropHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `drag` event on this element. If the dagged item is compatible
it adds request to saved requests.

methods.name: _dropRequest
methods.description:
Adds a request to the workspace.
It reads request data from the event and depending on keys configuration
either add request to the workspace or repace existing requests.

methods.name: _dropProject
methods.description:
Adds project to the dowspace.
It reads project data from the event and depending on keys configuration
either add requests to the workspace or repace existing requests.

methods.name: _computeDropOrder
methods.description: Computes index of the drop.

return.desc: Index where to drop the object.

methods.name: _blockEditors
methods.description: Sets `readonly` state on all editors

methods.name: _unblockEditors
methods.description: Removes `readonly` state from all editors

methods.name: _getReorderedItem
methods.description:
Gets the top level item from the DOM repeater that has been marked as a
draggable item.
The event can originate from child elements which shouldn't be dragged.

return.desc:
An element that is container for draggable items. Undefined if couldn't
find.

methods.name: _updateTabPosition
methods.description: Scrolls tabs right or left depending on dragged element position.

methods.name: _newTabDragover
methods.description: Action to handle dragover event when not in reorder mode.

methods.name: _removeDropPointer
methods.description: Removes drop pointer from shadow root.

methods.name: _createDropPointer
methods.description: Removes drop pointer to shadow root.

params.name: ref
params.description: A list item to be used as a reference point.

mixins.name: ArcWorkspaceDndMixin

attributes.name: draggable-enabled
attributes.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

mixins.description:
This mixin is to reduce amount of code in `arc-request-workspace` element
and to separate workspace state logic.

methods.name: _dispatchWorkspaceState
methods.description: Dispatches `workspace-state-read` event and returns it.

methods.name: restoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Restores workspace state.
It dispatches `workspace-state-read` custom event to query for workspace data
and restores requests if they were previously stored.

methods.name: _restoreModelError
methods.description: Called when no-model error occurred during workspace restoration.

methods.name: _restore
methods.description: Restores workspace state from previously stored data.

methods.name: _restoreRequests
methods.description: Restores requests from the state object.

params.name: requests
params.description:
List of requests to restore. When not set
then it adds empty request.

methods.name: _restoreSelected
methods.description:
Restores selection from the state file.
Note, at the point of state restoriation selection won't be handled properly.
It has to be re-selected after state restoration is complete.

params.name: selected
params.description:
Selected tab. When not set it selects last available
tab

methods.name: _restoreEnvironment
methods.description: Restores selected environment from the state file.

params.name: environment
params.description: Environment to restore. Nothing happens if not set.

methods.name: _restoreVariables
methods.description:
Restores workspace variables.
Each item must contain the following properties:
- variable {String} - variable name
- value {String} - variable value, can contain nested variables
- enabled {Boolean} - By default it is true, set false to disable the variable

methods.name: _restoreConfiguration
methods.description: Restores workspace variables.

methods.name: _afterRestore
methods.description:
Forces current selection and resets restoration flags after next
render.

methods.name: serializeWorkspace
methods.description: Serializes workspace state to a JavaScript object.

methods.name: serializeConfig
methods.description: Serializes workspace configuration.

methods.name: _notifyStoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Runs debouncer and after timeoout it calls `__dispatchStoreWorkspace()`
to dispatch store event.
If timer is running it's going to be cancelled and new timer set.

methods.name: _clearStoreTimeout
methods.description: Clears previously set storing timer.

methods.name: __dispatchStoreWorkspace
methods.description:
Dispatches `workspace-state-store` custom event to store workspace data.
The type of the request is `workspace-state`.

If there's an error it is not reported back to the user.

methods.name: _workspaceConfigChanged
methods.description:
A handler for any of the workspace configuration options changed.
It notifies change to the listeners.

methods.name: _workspaceReadOnlyChanged
methods.description:
Called when workspaceReadOnly property change. Always calls
`_workspaceReadOnlyChanged()`.

mixins.name: ArcWorkspaceStateMixin
